Explanation of ROC data output in SAS Logistic Regression

I have run the logistic regression in SAS on binary data set available online. http://www.ats.ucla.edu/stat/data/binary.csv below is the sample output: _PROB_ _POS_ _NEG_ _FALPOS_ _FALNEG_ _SENSIT_ _1MSPEC_ 0.941210953 1 127 0 272 0.003663004 0 0.928012776 2 127 0 271 0.007326007 0 0.927643195 3 127 0 270 0.010989011 0 0.925136849 4 127 0 269 0.014652015 0 0.921044923 5 127 0 268 0.018315018 0 0.91222972 6 127 0 267 0.021978022 0 0.903114817 7 127 0 266 0.025641026 0 0.902970992 8 127 0 265 0.029304029 0 0.901363504 9 127 0 264 0.032967033 0 0.897147605 10 127 0 263 0.036630037 0 0.891836956 11 127 0 262 0.04029304 0 0.891466706 12 127 0 261 0.043956044 0 0.89118058 13 127 0 260 0.047619048 0 0.887809967 14 127 0 259 0.051282051 0 0.886286835 15 127 0 258 0.054945055 0 0.884789828 15 126 1 258 0.054945055 0.007874016 0.883748771 16 126 1 257 0.058608059 0.007874016 0.883658492 17 126 1 256 0.062271062 0.007874016 0.883005072 18 126 1 255 0.065934066 0.007874016 0.881642156 19 126 1 254 0.06959707 0.007874016 0.881636206 20 126 1 253 0.073260073 0.007874016 0.881161673 21 126 1 252 0.076923077 0.007874016 0.880570499 21 125 2 252 0.076923077 0.015748032 0.879641459 22 125 2 251 0.080586081 0.015748032 0.878868995 23 125 2 250 0.084249084 0.015748032 ... How should I interpret this and how these values are calculated? Thanks.
